content.query:
SELECT *
FROM

    OPENROWSET(

        BULK 'https://sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net/synpase-storage/input/CSVFILESONLY/*.csv',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'

    )AS [result];

-- =====================================================
-- Azure Synapse Serverless SQL Pool - External Tables
-- Complete Script for CSV, Parquet, and Delta formats
-- =====================================================

-- Step 1: Create Master Key (Required for credentials)
-- Run this only once per database
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'YourStrongPassword123!';

-- Step 2: Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE externaldatasource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://external-data-source@sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net'
);

-- =====================================================
-- CSV FILE FORMAT AND EXTERNAL TABLE
-- =====================================================

-- Create External File Format for CSV
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT customerDataCSV
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ENCODING = 'UTF8',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )
);

-- Create External Table for CSV Data
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.CustomerDataCSV (
    CustomerID INT,
    FirstName NVARCHAR(50),
    LastName NVARCHAR(50),
    Email NVARCHAR(100),
    PhoneNumber NVARCHAR(20),
    Address NVARCHAR(200),
    City NVARCHAR(50),
    State NVARCHAR(50),
    ZipCode NVARCHAR(10),
    Country NVARCHAR(50),
    DateCreated DATE,
    IsActive BIT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/csv-data/',
    DATA_SOURCE = externaldatasource,
    FILE_FORMAT = customerDataCSV
);

-- =====================================================
-- PARQUET FILE FORMAT AND EXTERNAL TABLE
-- =====================================================

-- Create External File Format for Parquet
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT customerDataParquet
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
);

-- Create External Table for Parquet Data
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.CustomerDataParquet (
    CustomerID INT,
    FirstName NVARCHAR(50),
    LastName NVARCHAR(50),
    Email NVARCHAR(100),
    PhoneNumber NVARCHAR(20),
    Address NVARCHAR(200),
    City NVARCHAR(50),
    State NVARCHAR(50),
    ZipCode NVARCHAR(10),
    Country NVARCHAR(50),
    DateCreated DATE,
    IsActive BIT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/parquet-data/',
    DATA_SOURCE = externaldatasource,
    FILE_FORMAT = customerDataParquet
);

-- =====================================================
-- DELTA FILE FORMAT AND EXTERNAL TABLE
-- =====================================================

-- Create External File Format for Delta
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT customerDataDelta
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
);

-- Create External Table for Delta Data
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.CustomerDataDelta (
    CustomerID INT,
    FirstName NVARCHAR(50),
    LastName NVARCHAR(50),
    Email NVARCHAR(100),
    PhoneNumber NVARCHAR(20),
    Address NVARCHAR(200),
    City NVARCHAR(50),
    State NVARCHAR(50),
    ZipCode NVARCHAR(10),
    Country NVARCHAR(50),
    DateCreated DATE,
    IsActive BIT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/delta-data/',
    DATA_SOURCE = externaldatasource,
    FILE_FORMAT = customerDataDelta
);

-- =====================================================
-- TEST QUERIES
-- =====================================================

-- Test CSV External Table
SELECT TOP 10 * 
FROM dbo.CustomerDataCSV
ORDER BY CustomerID;

-- Test Parquet External Table
SELECT TOP 10 * 
FROM dbo.CustomerDataParquet
ORDER BY CustomerID;

-- Test Delta External Table
SELECT TOP 10 * 
FROM dbo.CustomerDataDelta
ORDER BY CustomerID;

-- Performance Comparison Query
SELECT 
    'CSV' as FileFormat,
    COUNT(*) as RecordCount,
    COUNT(DISTINCT Country) as UniqueCountries
FROM dbo.CustomerDataCSV
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'Parquet' as FileFormat,
    COUNT(*) as RecordCount,
    COUNT(DISTINCT Country) as UniqueCountries
FROM dbo.CustomerDataParquet
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'Delta' as FileFormat,
    COUNT(*) as RecordCount,
    COUNT(DISTINCT Country) as UniqueCountries
FROM dbo.CustomerDataDelta;

-- =====================================================
-- ALTERNATIVE: Using OPENROWSET for Quick Testing
-- =====================================================

-- Test CSV files directly without external table
SELECT TOP 5 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'csv-data/*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'externaldatasource',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    FIRSTROW = 2,
    FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
) AS [CSVData];

-- Test Parquet files directly
SELECT TOP 5 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'parquet-data/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'externaldatasource',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS [ParquetData];

-- Test Delta files directly
SELECT TOP 5 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'delta-data/',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'externaldatasource',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS [DeltaData];

-- =====================================================
-- CLEANUP COMMANDS (Use with caution!)
-- =====================================================

/*
-- Drop External Tables
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE IF EXISTS dbo.CustomerDataCSV;
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE IF EXISTS dbo.CustomerDataParquet;
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE IF EXISTS dbo.CustomerDataDelta;

-- Drop External File Formats
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT IF EXISTS customerDataCSV;
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT IF EXISTS customerDataParquet;
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT IF EXISTS customerDataDelta;

-- Drop External Data Source
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE IF EXISTS externaldatasource;
*/

-- Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE externaldatasource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://external-data-source@sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net'
);

-- Create External File Format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT customerDataCSV
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ENCODING = 'UTF8',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )
);

-- Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE externaldatasource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://external-data-source@sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net'
);

-- Create External File Format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT customerDataCSV
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2,
        ENCODING = 'UTF8',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    )
);

-- Create External Table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.CustomerData
(
    CustomerID INT,
    FirstName NVARCHAR(100),
    LastName NVARCHAR(100),
    Email NVARCHAR(200),
    Phone NVARCHAR(50),
    CreatedDate DATETIME2
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/input/customers/',  -- folder or file path inside the container
    DATA_SOURCE = externaldatasource,
    FILE_FORMAT = customerDataCSV,
    REJECT_TYPE = VALUE,
    REJECT_VALUE = 0
);

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net/synpase-storage/input/departments.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

-- Dedicated SQL pool

IF NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'newschema'
)
BEGIN
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA newschema');
END
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'final-project-folder_sepstoragegenz_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [final-project-folder_sepstoragegenz_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://final-project-folder@sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE newschema.frauded (
	[AccountID] nvarchar(4000),
	[TransactionID] nvarchar(4000),
	[TransactionAmount] float,
	[TransactionDate] date,
	[TransactionType] nvarchar(4000),
	[Location] nvarchar(4000),
	[DeviceID] float,
	[IP_Address] nvarchar(4000),
	[MerchantID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Channel] nvarchar(4000),
	[CustomerAge] int,
	[CustomerOccupation] nvarchar(4000),
	[TransactionDuration] int,
	[LoginAttempts] int,
	[AccountBalance] float,
	[PreviousTransactionDate] date,
	[Customer_ID] int,
	[Age] int,
	[Customer_Type] nvarchar(4000),
	[City] nvarchar(4000),
	[Region] nvarchar(4000),
	[Bank_Name] nvarchar(4000),
	[Branch_ID] int,
	[Fraud_Flag] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'silver/fraud_transcations/part-00000-8e396ce9-ba95-4b0d-afaa-9bb7d1c59c2e-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [final-project-folder_sepstoragegenz_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 10 * FROM newschema.frauded
GO

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT TOP 100
    jsonContent
/* --> place the keys that you see in JSON documents in the WITH clause:
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key1') AS header1
       , JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.key2') AS header2
*/
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net/synpase-storage/input/customer_info.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH (
        jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [result]

SELECT *
FROM

    OPENROWSET(

        BULK 'https://sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net/synpase-storage/input/*.csv',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'

    )AS [result];

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net/synpase-storage/input/bank_failures.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

-- Create the schema if it doesn't exist
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'wareschema')
BEGIN
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA wareschema');
END
GO

-- Create a physical (dedicated) table in the warehouse
CREATE TABLE wareschema.fraudedwh
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(AccountID),      -- distribute based on AccountID
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX          -- optimized for analytics
)
AS
SELECT *
FROM newschema.frauded;  -- ✅ external table as data source
GO

source:
%%sql

CREATE TABLE CustomerDelta (
    id INT,
    name STRING,
    age INT
)
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://customer-delta@sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net/input'

data = [
    (4, "Sita", 22),
    (5, "Ramesh", 35),
    (6, "Kiran", 29)
]
columns = ["id", "name", "age"]

df = spark.createDataFrame(data, columns)

# Append into your existing Delta table
df.write.format("delta").mode("append").save("abfss://customer-delta@sepstoragegenz.dfs.core.windows.net/input")
